-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Auth with smbclient command
--   
--   This module provides a interface for executing <tt>smbclient</tt>
--   commands.
@package sys-auth-smbclient
@version 2.0.0.0

module System.Authenticate.SmbClient

-- | Authenticate with <tt>smbclient</tt> command.
--   
--   Return Right if login success, Left otherwise.
--   
--   This does not accept empty username or password, because those has
--   always been success as Guest login.
loginSmbClient :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> IO SmbClientResult

-- | The login result type.
--   
--   If success, return Right with actual username.
type SmbClientResult = Either () Text
